name: Blueberry Ice Cream | Live Mixing
description:
A blueberry ice cream cone recipe. Made on Live Mixing

Watch here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CBQEbvMloL4
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Packs a wall of flavor! Yum!

I mixed this up late Friday night after the show and off the shake was super impressed. Very nice Blueberry (combining HS and FLV is a learned experience) will definitely use that again. Is a very pleasant creamy, berry vape - the blueberry is rich and dark without being earthy or to candy in nature. I think with a few days steep, this will get even better.
Thought at first glance you'd be going way over with the 3% (HS) French Vanilla Icecream, but noooo. This is super delicious of the shake and getting better still... Thx buddy ;)
